title: 6pc set of Chrome 3 Left / 3 Right Sealed-Gear Guitar Tuners/Machine Heads
features: Great for new work or repairs
3 Left/3 Right Alignment, includes all hardware
Also great for cigar box guitars!
description: This set of six sealed-gear chrome tuners is the perfect accent for your new instrument build, or as a replacement for an existing guitar repair job. These tuners are 3L/3R alignment (3 on the left of the headstock, 3 on the right), and include all necessary mounting hardware: screw-in bushing, chrome-plated washer, and mounting screws. They are intended for headstocks that are between 0.46" (11.72mm) and 0.65" (16.5mm) thick. A good rule of thumb is 1/2" to 5/8" thick, with 9/16" being the ideal. Trying to use these with thicker or thinner headstocks may not work. If you are looking for a great, affordable tuner/machine head style for your guitar, then look no further!
